org.athrun.android.framework
类 ScreenShot

java.lang.Object
  org.athrun.android.framework.ScreenShot

public class ScreenShot
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains the methods of catching screen shot Because the screen shot file is saved on sdcard, please add permission: android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE in test apk's AndroidManifest.xml

作者：
zhuangfei(jiand.zhaojd@alibaba-inc.com)
